simplified: 水至清则无鱼，人至察则无徒

pronunciation.pinyin: shuǐ zhì qīng zé wú yú , rén zhì chá zé wú tú
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: shui3 zhi4 qing1 ze2 wu2 yu2 , ren2 zhi4 cha2 ze2 wu2 tu2

details.simplified: 水至清则无鱼，人至察则无徒
details.traditional: 水至清則無魚，人至察則無徒

meanings.value: water that is too clear has no fish, and one who is too severe has no friends
